aciravata：aciravata（pu）
အစိရဝတ（ပု）
[acira+vata]
[အစိရ+ဝတ]

Aciravata：A novice who had a conversation with Prince Jayasena on the life of the bhikkhu. Aciravata repeats this conversation to the Buddha who thereupon preaches theDantabhūmi Sutta （M.iii.128ff）.

The novice is throughout addressed as Aggivessana.
